str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Set apart by (or for) God, holy, sacred. From hagos; sacred.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Passive - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To prevent, debar, hinder; with infin: from doing so and so. From the base of kolazo; to estop, i.e. Prevent.
A prolonged form of an otherwise obsolete verb; to talk, i.e. Utter words.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From lego; something said; by implication, a topic, also reasoning or motive; by extension, a computation; specially, the Divine Expression.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Asia, i.e. Asia Minor, or only its western shore.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To pass through, spread (as a report). From dia and erchomai; to traverse.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Feminine of a derivative of the base of chasma through the idea of empty expanse; room, i.e. A space of territory.
Probably of foreign origin; Phrygia, a region of Asia Minor.
Galatic, belonging to the province Galatia. From Galatia; Galatic or relating to Galatia.
